thread.title: L. van der Beek
thread.title_full: Americansoverseas Beoordeeld door L. van der Beek

author: L. van der Beek
title: L. van der Beek
text:
I have found Daan from to be extremely helpful with his advise and very generous with his time.
He was super fast and efficient responding to my needs and really went out of his way to help.
It was such an emotional relief to speak to someone who is also personally affected by this brutal and scary FATCA NIGHTMARE .
I found Daan to be very compassionate and caring.
Such a pity I stumbled across his website only at the later stages of my 2.5 year struggle.
Call him first before you spend tens of thousands of dollars with US tax attorneys and accountants.
